about_the_game:
Dive into a unique adventure that will put you against a world ruled by natural forces! Explore, craft, battle predators, tame animals, build homes, harvest crops & so much more. Gather your friends, grab a weapon, and head out to conquer the WILDLANDS!

  • Multiplayer - An online experience fully playable by yourself or with your friends!

  • Massive Open World - A giant world set on an island segmented into 14 unique biomes.

  • Wildlife - 65+ animal species coming from all over the world.

  • Tame Animals - Domesticate your favorite wild animals to help you on your adventure. They will fight alongside you, carry your items and allow you to travel faster.

  • Customization - Fully create your identity and embody the person of your choice with innumerable possible combinations of physical options.

  • Exploration - Explore ruins, temples, sunken ships, caverns and more in a world full of hidden places and secrets!

  • Gather & Scavenge - Collect natural resources or walk along the beaches to find objects washed up from distant lands!

  • Crafting, Forging & Cooking - Thousands of craftables & Dozens of cooking recipes! You can also upgrade your equipment with the reforging system!

  • RPG Progression - Advance your character through more than 100 levels by completing various activities.

  • Building, Housing & Electricity - Push the limits of your creativity with a limitless building system! Hundreds of building pieces, decorations & interactable objects allowing you to truly customize your home to your image.

  • Farming - Harvest 25+ types of crops, grow trees, or build a greenhouse with a watering system to automate the farming process!

  • Ranching - Create self-sufficiency by caring for animals and raising livestock.

  • Hunting & Fishing - Track down animals & hunt them for their valuable resources!

  • Apex Predators - 10+ world bosses to defeat in breathtaking arenas!

  • Endless - Due to its ever-changing world and interactive wildlife, your journey will never be the same.

WILDLANDS has been in constant development for several years now. We plan to add many more features in addition to perfecting the one already in place. Our goal with WILDLANDS is to release a complete game where people can immerse themselves in the full experience without having to wait or pay any extra to access everything a game should have. We strongly encourage you to join us on Discord if you want to share with us any ideas you have or simply have your questions answered!
